tours.title: Vintage Double Decker Bus Tour & Thames River Cruise

description.title: Description
description.info:
See the highlights of London via 2 classic modes of transport on this half-day adventure. First, you will enjoy great views of Westminster Abbey, the Houses of Parliament, and the London Eye, as you meander through the historic streets on board a vintage double decker bus.

Continue to see St. Paul’s Cathedral, Sir Christopher Wren’s architectural masterpiece, where Admirals Nelson and Wellington are buried, and Princess Diana and Prince Charles got married. Continue to the Tower of London, built nearly 1,000 years ago during the reign of William the Conqueror.

Home to the Crown Jewels, the Tower is protected by the famous Beefeaters, and the imposing palace has been used as a fortress and a prison throughout its history. Your guide will take you to Traitors Gate, where prisoners entered the Tower for the last time.

Next, take a short trip along the River Thames, passing Shakespeare’s Globe, Cleopatra’s Needle, and London Bridge, before arriving at Westminster Pier. Rejoin the bus and head for Buckingham Palace. Make your way to the perfect spot to watch the world famous Changing of the Guard ceremony as the soldiers, dressed in their fabulous tunics and busbies, march to military music.

activity.title: Activity
list: Discover London on board a classic Routemaster vintage double decker bus
Cruise down the River Thames
See the Changing of the Guard
Go to Westminster Abbey
Listen to the chimes of Big Ben and see the Houses of Parliament
Double-decker Routemaster tour
Short trip along the River Thames
Changing of the Guard

tours.title: Historical London Walking Tour & Tower of London

description.title: Description
description.info:
Step back in time and explore London's rich history on this immersive walking tour. Start at the iconic Tower of London, where the infamous Beefeaters will guide you through centuries of royal history and intrigue.

Marvel at the Crown Jewels, hear tales of past executions, and walk the medieval walls that once protected the city. Then, follow your expert guide through historic alleyways to discover hidden gems, including St. Dunstan in the East and the ruins of an ancient monastery.

Conclude your journey at the famous Tower Bridge, where you'll enjoy breathtaking views of the Thames and the city skyline.

activity.title: Activity
list: Visit the legendary Tower of London with a guided tour
See the world-famous Crown Jewels
Walk through historic alleys and hidden London landmarks
Cross the iconic Tower Bridge
Hear stories of medieval London from a local historian

tours.title: London Night Sightseeing Tour on an Open-Top Bus

description.title: Description
description.info:
Experience the magic of London at night on this breathtaking open-top bus tour. As the city lights up, you'll cruise past some of its most iconic landmarks, including Big Ben, Tower Bridge, and the London Eye.

Your expert guide will share fascinating stories about the city's history and culture as you take in the illuminated skyline. Enjoy spectacular views of St. Paul's Cathedral, Trafalgar Square, and Buckingham Palace, all beautifully lit up in the evening.

This tour is perfect for those who want to see London in a whole new light while enjoying a relaxing ride through its historic streets.

activity.title: Activity
list: Enjoy an evening bus tour of London with stunning night views

Learn about the city's history from a live guide

Experience the beauty of London's nightlife in comfort

tours.title: Tokyo Shibuya Food and Nightlife Tour

description.title: Description
description.info:
Experience the vibrant nightlife and delicious street food of Tokyo's famous Shibuya district. This guided tour takes you through hidden izakayas, local food stalls, and popular nightlife spots, giving you a true taste of Tokyo after dark.

Start your journey at the iconic Shibuya Crossing before heading into the backstreets to discover Tokyo’s best-kept food secrets. Taste authentic yakitori, ramen, and Japanese whisky as you explore lively bars and restaurants.

Perfect for food lovers and night owls, this tour will show you a different side of Tokyo—one filled with neon lights, delicious aromas, and endless excitement.

activity.title: Activity
list: Walk through the bustling streets of Shibuya and experience Tokyo’s nightlife

Visit hidden izakayas (Japanese pubs) and enjoy drinks with locals

tours.title: Tokyo Asakusa Temple and Street Food Tour

description.title: Description
description.info:
Explore the historical heart of Tokyo in Asakusa, home to the famous Sensō-ji Temple and Nakamise shopping street. This tour will take you through the bustling streets filled with traditional snacks and souvenirs while learning about Japan’s rich history.

Start by visiting Sensō-ji, Tokyo’s oldest temple, before strolling through Nakamise Street to sample authentic Japanese street food, including taiyaki (fish-shaped pastries), melon pan, and matcha treats.

Perfect for history lovers and foodies, this tour offers a deep dive into Tokyo’s cultural heritage.

activity.title: Activity
list: Visit Sensō-ji, Tokyo’s oldest and most famous Buddhist temple
Walk through Nakamise Street and explore its traditional market
Try authentic Japanese street food, including taiyaki and melon pan
Learn about Tokyo’s rich history and religious traditions
